Class AbstractDelegate

java.lang.Object
autumn.lang.internals.AbstractFunctor
autumn.lang.internals.AbstractTypedFunctor
autumn.lang.internals.AbstractDelegate
All Implemented Interfaces:
Delegate, Functor, TypedFunctor
Direct Known Subclasses:
ModuleDelegate
public abstract class AbstractDelegate extends AbstractTypedFunctor implements Delegate
This class provides a partial implementation of the Delegate interface.

Mackenzie High
